name: IB_MESSAGE_THREA_4
description: The email address the In Basket message was sent to.

columns.name: THREAD_ID
columns.description: Unique message thread ID. A message thread is similar to a conversation in email - it is a series of messages related to the same patient encounter.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: EMAIL
columns.description: The email address the In Basket message was sent to.
